replies.body:
Riot clearly does not watch/play any 3v3 
Olaf is going to be extremely broken

Riot has been pretty clear about their balance changes being focused on Summoners Rift. 
The other maps are little more than fun, gimmicky places to play.

I know there is a reasonable TT community but Rito owns the game and they simply aren't interested.
Honestly there are probably too few TT fans, in which case, who can blame them?
the SSW skins looks like a cover for an anime :P
*Cough cough* Star Guardian Lux *cough cough*
I think a nice feature for attack move could be preferably target champions, so if there is a champion in range when you attack move, minions will never be targeted.
I think they wanted to leave some skill to it.
So, when is this patch going live?

If you bothered to check the announcement for the maintenance (found here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/ajvyYdUK-scheduled-maintenance-patch-59-15052015 ) You'd know that  it's on the 15/05/15, which is tomorrow.
Thankyou, sorry i'm really tired that didn't cross my mind.

As much as I'm excited for the Ashe rework I have a few rants to get off my chest at Riot because of what I find to be idiotic -.-

> While {{champion:25}}  strong crowd control and top-tier denial tool in Black Shield make her fantastic for those looking to protect a priority target or pick off a straggler, they also toe the line of making her a 'fallen-angel-of-all-trades'. In the interest of keeping her strengths strong, we're limiting her early lane control with the powerhouse pushing of Tormented Soil so she isn't great in every situation

Are you people at Riot retarded? You want to nerf Morgana, but you keep nerfing the wrong f*cking thing every single time "you attempt to nerf Morgana". Either nerf her Q so people can stop bitching about the root time, or nerf her black shield so she's not a f*cking anti CC machine. Why the hell can cast an {{champion:2}} ult every 15 f*cking seconds? They should rework it so it blocks ONE form of CC, not almost every single f*cking thing for 6 seconds. And people who are dumb saying "oh, but you can pop the black shield herp pe derp" its not exactly that simple popping the black shield, especially in teamfights when she can just black shield the initiator and let them run wild, wrecking people in teamfights and almost guaranteeing a win with her bloody CC

And {{champion:75}}...god I hate this champ. I hate him regardless of who's playing him or what team he's on. He truly makes my blood boil. RIOT, JUST REWORK HIM ALREADY! He either is a useless piece of sh*t who will AFK farm for almost the entire f*cking game turning it into a 4v5, or he will become so insanely strong that he can almost one shot Q anyone who is stupid enough to let him farm for the entire game, and the fact he can INFINITELY increase his Q damage! He's either a useless piece of sh*t or an unstoppable piece of shit, and I despise anyone who even thinks of playing this ridiculous champ.

Also...WHY THE F*CK ARE YOU NERFING {{champion:92}}?! FOR F*CKS SAKE LEAVE HER ALONE ALREADY!!! SHE'S ALREADY BEEN NERFED HARD OVER THE YEARS! IF YOU CONTINUE NERFING HER SHE'S GONNA BECOME LIKE OLAF!

And seriously, {{champion:23}}'s ult needs to be reworked so that he doesn't use it all the time to just run away unscathed, or tower dive with no consequences or just simply stay in and kill an enemy before running off with his E!

Honestly Riot...what the hell are you guys doing...

the bans will change hope fully and really olaf is strong but 15 seconds is long compared to some and extremely short to others champion diversity is a good thing but maybe we need to up the bans to 1 per player not just the leader bringing it 6>10 it could be a good thing  :D

Spot the riven main
{{summoner:2}}

The {{champion:92}} nerf is next to nothing... Her Windslash can now be avoided if you're at the edge of her range allowing for counterplay, and her base speed was reduced by 5... omg what a nerf! -5 Movement! Riot plz, it's too much!

As if any decent Riven player walks most of the time...
Someone either really dislikes all champions he/she loses against, or has some serious toxicity issues >_<
Thanks for the rage, I needed a laugh.

{{champion:82}} needs a nerf because he has just been wrecking face in every game i see him in, both on my team and on the enemy team, I have no clue why Riot hasn't done anything about that.

{{champion:238}} Zed doesnt even need a goddamn nerf, he's been fine unless people are dumb enough to feed him 10 kills. 

And when the hell is {{champion:67}} gonna get a buff? She has been in a bad spot for ages and is almost one of the worst ADCs to rely on unless you have an experienced Vayne player on your team >.>

{{champion:103}}'s Q should be nerfed so that it only gives her a speed boost if she hits an enemy champion because she can just spam her Q to run away from everyone, not to mention she already has ridiculous mobility anyways and a really annoying Charm.

Hopefully the {{item:3717}} and {{item:3715}} nerfs should affect {{champion:113}} and {{champion:102}}. Those two definitely need a nerf
zed nerf about time
Olaf is going to be absolutely insane with righteous glory.
ZED SKIN!!!
New Zed skin,I was thinking nightmare Zed but please new Zed skin Riot. P.s Lots of people are waiting for a badass Zed skin. {{champion:238}}
{{champion:22}}  so broken
{{champion:99}}skin hype!! {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}}
i tested the cinderhulk hardly noticed the difference still cleared fast and felt the same as before  :D

Too good Star Guardian {{champion:99}}

Interested to see how the reworked {{champion:22}} plays out.....
Though the update for 'Attack Move' shall be wonderful !!
{{champion:18}} buff, i couldnt be happier. hopefully i can go back to safely maining her

My main question is: Why is there no sejuani nerf?
Don't get me wrong I love sejuani and love playing her, but atm she is being banned in literally every ranked that I play. 
I guess the cinderhaulk nerf did hit her quite hard so we'll see what happens.
they spoke a little on why she isnt being nerfed in the patch rundown, pretty much said they'll nerf the item (cinderhulk) then if she still needs a nerf shes gonna get it too
All hail Lord{{champion:82}}
Lux lux lux! Can't wait.
{{summoner:31}} {{summoner:13}} {{champion:143}}
Yay, nerf to boxbox!  Would rather her early game damage be nerfed but oh well
Ermahgerd I demand EDG skins
Tomorrow.
Why Nerf morgana, she doesn't warrant it.

Have you ever tried to fast push a lane with Tormented soil? 
It's the best way to ensure even a high elo laner loses out in cs.
Bronze though, omg it's funny to see sub 5 cs at 10 min.

This is a pretty reasonable nerf.
Buff {{champion:67}} and {{champion:238}}

Welcome to the league of remaking champ with stacks!!!!!!!!!!!!!! XD
{{champion:18}} {{champion:13}} and now {{champion:22}} !!!!!!!!!!!!
Do not Ashe and Ryze are champs that in tutorial training? So please remake them again to make them suitable for nooooooooooooooooooooooobs.Thanks Riot.

So a random Annie nerf, a crazy Akali buff, and a sailor moon Lux skin...

What is going on in that office?
Time to troll! {{champion:48}}
changing a game that doesnt need to be changed. BRING BACK SEASON 2 FUCK YOU RIOT
